name: Victory Exterminatus Extremis test "Spacehulk Encounter"
description:
Goal.. The player can launch a variety of boarding actions onto the spacehulk.. right now there are just 3 "areas" to the hulk, but I want to make this into a simple random dungeon.. so Player might launch a "boarding torpedo" that will drill a little ways into  an enemy ship or this spacehulk, and then release troops.. which will explore the hulk and probably die horribly before they can get to that 3rd area and investigate some kinda "strange signal"

May 27th.. added new version with some better cameras.. working on units/troops. making some better shapes for the spacehulks.. and studying some of the official art.

May 26.. made some basic building shapes for the random dungeon bits for the spacehulk.. and for the players frigate... these can be toggled on and off in the "tactical view. .. below we see a small mini dungeon the player will be able to send troops to to explore. 

May 25..  150 megs.. tearing apart, refining and rescaling stuff... focusing on an encounter with a spacehulk.. working on all that seperatly, and will add to main game at next update. 

above.. the Player's ship over a large spacehulk.. and 3 areas within the hulk seen through the map filters.
